channel.title: This is frustrating, click here if u love to help ppl!
channel.description: OK, SO on my server, i have NO trade timer, for when ppl trade,drop, or pk, for at least 60minutes! this caused duping on my server, now could anyone please help me? please dontpost comments that aren't needed! Thanks! ~~WaleedScape~~

item.title: This is frustrating, click here if u love to help ppl!
item.dc:creator: @WiseMen WiseMen
item.description:
@WiseMen wrote:

WaleedScape:

i mean that i dont have a trade/pk/drop timer on my server

Well, i’d suggest using that Search Bar up to of the page. There must be plenty of guides, on how to add one. If not, you’ll have to stick around until some kind person helps you. Sorry I couldn’t help enough.

Read full topic
